"Hraa'khor! Listen well, mortals, for I, Kraaz, shall claim dominion over these darkened caverns! My path is paved with chaos, and my grin is as sharp as the whispers of the void goblins. By the power of the shadows, I shall bend reality to my whim and rule with an iron fist... or rather, a mischievous grin!"
